segments.text: Good morning ! I am a rookie in our office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning ! Welcome to our office !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Nice to meet you ! My name is Peter Smith .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Nice to meet you too ! I am George Williams .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is my first day at work !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , hope you will enjoy your first day !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am new to the work and I will appreciate your guidance !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will try my best to assist you if you need any help .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . It is very kind of you .
segments.speaker: S1
